body_html: A quick experiment confirmed: If the above save_path is something like ~/tmp/ (i.e. in my local home), the problem does not exist. So the global /tmp causes problems. tensorboard logs into /tmp without problems, as additional information.
body_text: A quick experiment confirmed: If the above save_path is something like ~/tmp/ (i.e. in my local home), the problem does not exist. So the global /tmp causes problems. tensorboard logs into /tmp without problems, as additional information.
body: A quick experiment confirmed: If the above `save_path` is something like `~/tmp/` (i.e. in my local home), the problem does not exist. So the global `/tmp` causes problems. `tensorboard` logs into `/tmp` without problems, as additional information.
